references: Marilyn vos Savant and Leonore Fleischer, Brain Building in Just 12 Weeks, Bantam Books, New York, NY, 1991, pp. 104-105, 119.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) ~ n^3. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 30 2013
prog: (PARI) { n=0; forprime (p=2, prime(1000), write("b060822.txt", n++, " ", p + n^2 + n^3 + (2*n - 1) + (2*n)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 12 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 05 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 07 2001
